  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10265</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Back in the Playground Blues (by Adrian Mitchell) - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre Back in the Playground Blues (por Adrian Mitchell)</string>
            <string language="ga">Back in the Playground Blues (le Adrian Mitchell) – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zurück im Spielplatz-Blau (durch Adrian Mitchell)
- Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En arrière dans les bleus de cour de jeu (par 
Adrian Mitchell) - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para trás nos azuis do playground (por Adrian 
Mitchell) - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Indietro negli azzurri del campo da giuoco (da 
Adrian Mitchell) - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίσω στα μπλε παιδικών χαρών (από τον Adrian 
Mitchell) - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will be able to understand the theme of this poem and relate to the poet.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes podrán comprender el tema de este poema e identificarse con el poeta.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh daltaí ábalta téama an dáin a thuiscint agus bheith comhbhách leis an bhfile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können, das Thema dieses Gedichtes
zu verstehen und auf dem Dichter in Verbindung zu stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants pourront comprendre le thème de 
cette poésie et associer au poèt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes poderão  compreender o tema deste 
poema e relacionar-se ao poeta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi potranno capire il tema di questo poem
e riferirsi al poet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα είναι σε θέση να καταλάβουν το θέμα 
αυτού του ποιήματος και να αφορούν τον ποιητή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
